scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.bundle: mkdir -p dist && npx tsc && npx rollup -c
scripts.minify: uglifyjs dist/toast.js --compress --output dist/toast.min.js --source-map 'content=inline' && mkdir -p tests/lib && cp -f dist/toast.min.js tests/lib/ && mv -f dist/toast.min.js.map tests/lib/
scripts.karma:all: npm run kill-karma && npx karma start
scripts.karma:chrome: npm run kill-karma && npx karma start --browsers chrome
scripts.karma:old_chrome: npm run kill-karma && npx karma start --browsers old_chrome
